description:
The discovery of T.K.`s Crest of Hope reveals a cave engraved with Digi-code. Izzy receives an e-mail from Datamon asking for help from within Etemon`s headquarters, which is a large upside down pyramid. Datamon promises them that if they free him, he will show them Sora`s Crest. After he is freed, however, he escapes and kidnaps Sora. He intends on making a copy of her so that he can control Biyomon.
Source: crunchyroll
